<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_hocsa_san_encuesta_de_proyecto</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SLX NPS</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	
var gr = new GlideRecord('x_hocsa_san_encuesta_de_proyecto');

	
var q9 = current.u_slx_q9;

var question =[gr].getValue('u_slx_q9');
gs.addInfoMessage(question);
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>slx.bs</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-07-27 21:53:49</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ea0453011b5e50948802dac2cd4bcbcb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SLX NPS</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="san" source="x_hocsa_san">b3538a711ba598108802dac2cd4bcb8e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="san">b3538a711ba598108802dac2cd4bcb8e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_ea0453011b5e50948802dac2cd4bcbcb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>slx.bs</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-07-27 21:53:49</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=ea0453011b5e50948802dac2cd4bcbcb"/></record_update>
